snippet: The new leader has a plan to sort the sprawling bank’s operations by the kinds of projects involved, like agriculture or energy, rather than by region.
abstract: World Bank president Jim Yong Kim has sweeping plan to sort sprawling bank’s operations by the kinds of projects involved, like agriculture or energy, rather than by region; reorganization, first in nearly two decades, is meant to encourage collaboration.
lead_paragraph: The new leader has a plan to sort the sprawling bank’s operations by the kinds of projects involved, like agriculture or energy, rather than by region.

headline.main: World Bank, Rooted in Bureaucracy, Proposes a Sweeping Reorganization
